meanings.definition: palletizers: a machine used to stack goods onto a pallet
meanings.sent1: The palletizers efficiently stacked boxes onto the pallet.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse invested in new palletizers to speed up the packing process.
meanings.sent3: The palletizers in the factory never got tired of their stacking job.
meanings.sent4: The palletizers hummed along, turning chaos into neat stacks like magic.
meanings.sent5: The loud clunk of the palletizers echoed through the warehouse.

meanings.definition: palletizers: a person who operates a palletizing machine
meanings.sent1: The skilled palletizers knew how to operate the machine flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: The company hired experienced palletizers to handle the heavy machinery.
meanings.sent3: The palletizers joked about having a 'palletizing party' after work.
meanings.sent4: She moved the controls with precision, like a conductor directing an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The palletizers' expertise ensured smooth operation of the warehouse.
